name: Capricious Visage
title: Preponderant Recollection: Capricious Visage
desc: Even a faint smile could not conceal her sorrow.\nThough this is a festive day, it seems more like a farewell...
in_play_description: When the character uses an Elemental Skill or equips a Talent Card: Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)

skills.desc:
When the character uses an Elemental Skill or equips a Talent: Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
